hypothesis_content.title: BTC 4-Hour Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a period of low volatility (Bollinger Band Width on 4H chart < 0.02) within a NEUTRAL regime, a subsequent breakout on the 4H close above the upper band, accompanied by a 50% increase in volume relative to the 20-period average, will lead to a directional move of at least 2.5% in the breakout direction over the next 12 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes often feature consolidation and compression. A Bollinger Band squeeze measures this compression. A high-volume breakout from such a tight range suggests a genuine shift in supply/demand, overcoming prior equilibrium. The volume filter helps avoid false, low-conviction breaks.
entry_conditions: BTC 4H Bollinger Band (20,2) Width < 0.02 for at least 3 consecutive periods
4H candle closes above the upper Bollinger Band
Volume for breakout candle > 1.5 * 20-period volume moving average

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Close back inside the Bollinger Bands on a 4H candle
exit_conditions.time_exit: 12 hours after entry if TP/SL not hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 55% of such qualified breakout signals fail to achieve the 2.5% target within 12 hours, or the average win rate is below 52% over 100+ historical instances.
